full_summary:
# Road Maintenance Standing Offer for Military Training Area (MTA) North of Riske Creek, Williams Lake

## Brief Overview

*Procurement Reference Number:* WS4578920331-Doc4579149957
*Procurement Solicitation Number:* WS4578920331
*Publication Date:* May 10, 2024
*Tender Closing Date:* June 14, 2024

## Contract Details

*Contract Start Date:* July 1, 2024
*Contract End Date:* June 30, 2025
(Expected)

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking to establish a standing offer with one (1) year of service and four (4) one-year option periods for the development and maintenance of Military Training Area (MTA) forest roads, including snow plowing. The contract aims to provide access to the MTA Lands base, including potential road building, snow plowing, and road deactivation.

## Contract Objectives

The key services to be provided include:

* Road grading of 5 and 8 metres of running surface
* Road building of 5 and 8 metres of running surface
* Snow plowing of 5 and 8 metres of running surface
* Road deactivation of 5 and 8 metres of running surface

## Terms and Conditions

* The standing offer will be awarded to up to five (5) qualified Offerors.
* The standing offer will be for a period of one (1) year with four (4) one-year option periods.
* Sellers will be expected to provide development and maintenance services on an as-needed basis throughout the contract term.

## Contracting Entity and Contact Information

* [Contracting Entity Name:] Department of Indigenous Services (ISC)
* [Contracting Entity Address:] (Unavailable)

*Simon Leung* is the contact person for this procurement. Durable inquiries and submissions can be sent to:

Email: <simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*Note:* Please refer to notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19665968> for more information and procurement documents.
